definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: Budgets are prepared under the directions of a company's controller on an annual basis.
sentences.chinese: 由公司主計長指導編制的年度預算。

sentences.english: The new student received a letter from the controller's office regarding her tuition.
sentences.chinese: 新生收到了一封來自主計官辦公室的有關學費的信。

sentences.english: The new student receive a letter from the controller's office regarding her tuition.
sentences.chinese: 新生收到了一封來自主計官辦公室的有關學費的信。

sentences.english: DGBA officials think that this is related to the economic recession and lack of jobs.
sentences.chinese: 主計處官員認爲可能跟景氣低迷，工作機會少有關。
